page.description: For internal use only. Make a unique thread name, provide preferred name, numbers will be added if thread on name already exists.

argument.name: Unique_Name
argument.description: A unique thread name based on the supplied thread name.

page.discussion: The THREAD_NAME_CREATE() function returns a unique variant of the thread name based on the suppled thread name. No user interface related commands are allowed in a thread. Using any command that attempts to create or manipulate any type of user interface from within a thread will cause Alpha Anywhere to hang. Examples of such invalid functions include debug() , ui_*, StatusBar.*, ControlPanel.*, trace.*, etc.
